long_description: Wheel your way straight from the car to the picnic table-no more of that awkward cooler-carrying shuffle you used to do! Retractable pull handle makes transportation a breeze; rugged wheels roll smoothly and quietly. Four 1.5-inch deep cup holders on lid keep cans and glasses in place. Hinged, split lid allows you access to the interior without letting out all the cool air or having to move all your drinks off the top. Side handles provide additional carrying options without pinching your hands. Drain offers easy flow when open and plugs up tight for no-leak security. Excellent thermal retention keeps beverages cold for hours. Stain- and odor-resistant liner is easy to clean.
short_description: Wheel your way straight from the car to the picnic table-no more of that awkward cooler-carrying shuffle you used to do!
